name: Visions (Sparkling)
description:
Visions [currently in  Alpha development] is a Christian MMORPG  set in the ancient Roman empire - currently the only playable zone is the island of Cyprus. Players can experience history as a Roman citizen, learn a profession, do quests, fight bandits,  harvest resources, explore the geographically relevant terrain, play with friends, and ride a horse. Players will experience updates to the game and see the changes to the game world as the developers implement new content.   Currently the game is for Windows PC computers.

We are a very small indie team. All donations go to help the developers in creating this game for you. Thank you for your support!
